titles.title: Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the employer wage credit for activated military reservists.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2013--Introduced. Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2018 the tax credit for differential wage payments made by a small business employer on behalf of employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.
